vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.23.27
§ Abiezer = "my father is help"
1) a Manassite, called "son" of Gilead, also son of Gilead's sister
2) a Benjamite, warrior of David
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Hamoléquet; ancestro de un clan; tribu de Manasés; (b)   hombre
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞比以謝 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我父是幫助"
1) 瑪拿西人, 稱為基列之子, 也是基列姊妹的兒子
2) 便雅憫人, 大衛的戰士
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚比以谢 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我父是帮助"
1) 玛拿西人, 称为基列之子, 也是基列姊妹的儿子
2) 便雅悯人, 大卫的战士

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.18 and Hammolecheth (H4447);
brother of: Ishhod (H0379) and Mahlah (H4244H)
§ Abiezer = "my father is help"
1) a Manassite, called "son" of Gilead, also son of Gilead's sister
2) a Benjamite, warrior of David

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.30;
son of: Gilead (H1568H);
brother of: Helek (H2507), Asriel (H0844), Shechem (H7928), Shemida (H8061) and Hepher (H2660A); also called Iezer (KJV: Jeezer) at Num.26.30;
§ Abiezer = "my father is help"
1) a Manassite, called "son" of Gilead, also son of Gilead's sister
2) a Benjamite, warrior of David
